hero.title: Bridge the Experience Gap with
hero.subtitle: Transform your junior talent into senior-level performers. Maia's AI assistants work alongside your team, delivering consistent, high-quality results while keeping your data completely private.

whyMaia.title: Why
whyMaia.subtitle: The experience gap between junior and senior talent is costing you time, money, and quality. Here's how we fix it.

card1.title: Senior-Level Quality, Without Senior-Only Teams
card1.description: Hiring senior talent is expensive and slow. Juniors need years to grow. With Maia, you don't have to wait. Our AI assistants sit beside your people, filling in the experience they don't yet have.

card2.title: Humans First, AI at Their Side
card2.description: We don't replace employees — we empower them. Seniors focus on strategy and leadership. Juniors and mid-levels get the support they need to perform closer to a senior level.

card3.title: Consistency Across the Team
card3.description: Best practices, templates, and review criteria are built into Maia assistants. That means your outputs stay on standard, regardless of who on the team is doing the work.

securityTrust.title: Security & Trust
securityTrust.subtitle: Your data stays private. Your team gets smarter.

card1.title: Private by Design
card1.description: Your data never leaves your environment. No third-party access, no data sharing, no compromises.

card2.title: Enterprise Security
card2.description: Built with enterprise-grade security standards. SOC 2 compliant, with end-to-end encryption.

card3.title: No Data Mining
card3.description: We don't train on your data. Your information stays yours, always.

step1.title: Connect Your Tools
step1.description: Integrate with your existing workflow. Slack, Teams, or direct API access.

step2.title: Deploy AI Assistants
step2.description: Our assistants join your team, ready to help with specific tasks and challenges.

step3.title: Watch Your Team Excel
step3.description: See immediate improvements in quality, consistency, and speed across your organization.

engineering.title: Engineering
engineering.description: Code reviews, architecture decisions, debugging assistance

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Campaign strategy, content creation, performance analysis

sales.title: Sales
sales.description: Proposal writing, client research, deal strategy

whatMakesDifferent.title: What Makes Maia Different
whatMakesDifferent.subtitle: We're not just another AI tool

card1.title: Built for Teams
card1.description: Designed to enhance human collaboration, not replace it.

card2.title: Privacy First
card2.description: Your data never leaves your control. No compromises on security.

card3.title: Proven Results
card3.description: Real teams, real results. See the difference in weeks, not months.

cta.title: Ready to Bridge the
cta.subtitle: Join forward-thinking teams who are already using Maia to unlock their junior talent's potential.
cta.subtitleHighlight: Your data stays private. Your team gets smarter.

securityTrust.title: Security & Trust
securityTrust.subtitle: Not ChatGPT. Not Third-Party. Your Data, Your Control.
securityTrust.description: Unlike generic AI tools, Maia never sends your data to ChatGPT or any other third-party provider. We run our own models in our own cloud, so your data stays private, compliant, and under your control.
securityTrust.feature2: Full transparency into how assistants generate results.
securityTrust.feature3: Built-in guardrails aligned to your policies and compliance needs.
securityTrust.conclusion: You can safely let your employees — even juniors — use Maia on sensitive tasks, knowing your data won't leak outside your environment.

howItWorks.title: How It
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in 4 simple steps. No complex setup, no months of training. Your team will be productive from day one.

step1.title: Map Critical Work
step1.description: Identify the tasks where experience gaps slow your team down — from drafting reports to analyzing data to answering client questions.

step2.title: Capture Know-How
step2.description: Maia encodes your playbooks, templates, and review criteria into task-specific assistants.

step3.title: Pair and Deliver
step3.description: Employees collaborate with Maia in their daily tools to draft, check, and polish deliverables.

step4.title: Review and Improve
step4.description: Managers keep oversight while Maia learns from feedback, tightening quality over time.

benefit1.title: Near-Senior Output
benefit1.description: Juniors produce work that feels close to senior-level, ready faster and with fewer revisions.

benefit2.title: Faster Ramp-Up
benefit2.description: New hires get productive sooner, guided by assistants that embed your standards.

benefit3.title: Fewer Review Loops
benefit3.description: Built-in checks reduce errors and rework, saving manager time.

benefit4.title: Scalable Quality
benefit4.description: Deliver consistently high-quality results without staffing every role with seniors.

whereMaiaHelps.title: Where
whereMaiaHelps.subtitle: From operations to compliance, Maia enhances every aspect of your team's work with AI-powered assistance.

operations.title: Operations & Product
operations.description: Turn rough inputs into structured specs, documentation, and action plans.

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Draft responses and triage cases with greater accuracy and speed.

processes.title: Internal Processes
processes.description: Answer policy questions instantly, cutting tickets and unblock employees.

training.title: Training & Enablement
training.description: Provide on-demand guidance that helps juniors perform like seasoned staff.

compliance.title: Compliance & QA
compliance.description: Enforce checklists and validations that keep deliverables audit-ready.

feature1.title: Private by Design
feature1.description: Your data never leaves Maia. We don't use ChatGPT or any third-party providers.

feature2.title: Task-Specific Assistants
feature2.description: Not generic chatbots — assistants built for your workflows.

feature3.title: Accountability Built In
feature3.description: See and control how answers are generated, not just the final result.

feature4.title: Human-Centered
feature4.description: Designed to elevate employees, not replace them.

footer.tagline: Building AI assistants for every business need.
